overview:
David joined notifymd in February 1997. He has more than 20 years of experience in directing various operating entities, overseeing Human Resource/Administrative responsibilities, and managing Accounting and Finance departments. Prior to joining notifymd, he served as manager of accounting for the largest healthcare system in Michigan. Prior to that position, David was supervisor of accounting for a growth-oriented technology company, directing the accounting operations and implementation of various accounting and billing systems. He began his career in public accounting with a large regional firm based in suburban Detroit. David received a Bachelor of Accounting Degree from Walsh College and is a Certified Public Accountant.

David resides in Brentwood, Tenn. with his wife, two kids, and two energetic puppies. He is known around the office as “Mr. Trivia” for his knowledge of useless and obscure information. “It is important that people enjoy what they do, and creating an exciting and fun environment is essential for a company to be successful.”
